name: The Count (itch) (PESKYWAABBIT)
description:
You used to count meteors with your dad when you were young if the night was clear. Since your dad has passed you've kept a log of the meteors you've seen every night. Count and log each meteor shower and try to be as accurate as possible.

How far can you go? Comment with your best shower below...

Enter the number and press the enter key. The first time level it may take a few presses of the enter key but after that the game works fine. I also had a problem with scaling so you may not see the whole screen but I'm proud of what I got done.

Created as a part of the https://itch.io/jam/paint-jam-2019

The goal of this game jam was to create all art assets using Microsoft Paint.

Thanks to Amy Potter and Alex Turnbull for helping me with coding bugs <3
